titlestmt.titleproper: Freshman Handbook Issued by Panhellenic Association of Jackson CollegeUP077

publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-10 19:06:26 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Freshman Handbook Issued by Panhellenic Association of Jackson College

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one handbook about Tufts fraternities, written by students and published by the Panhellenic Association of Jackson College.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Responsibility for new student orientation once fell under the pervue of the Orientation Committee. Currently, the Office for Campus Life takes a leadership role in the planning and implementation of New Student Orientation.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research
